about.aboutContent:
The Housing ATO Calculator can assist housing and land use planning efforts. This tool is intended to be used as a conversation starter, a helpful visualization tool, and a data-informed guide about planning for housing based on access to opportunities. Users choose what factors are important to their community and prioritize them. The tool produces a heat map of locations that have the most accessibility to the least accessibility to opportunities based on the user's prioritization.


This map is currently a beta-version and is still being improved and tested. Please email Bill Hereth (bhereth@wfrc.org) with any questions, comments, or issues.


This tool was built off of the Weber Housing Location Explorer. For more information about the methodology, please visit the story map at http://bit.ly/weberhousing.
